item.title: Anger
item.description: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.

item.title: Blame
item.description: “They blame those who remain silent, they blame those who speak much, they blame those who speak in moderation. There is none in the world who is not blamed.”
